Verifies that creating a SAB in a non-COI context causes an issue.

Inspector issue: {
    issue : {
        code : SharedArrayBufferIssue
        details : {
            sharedArrayBufferIssueDetails : {
                isWarning : true
                sourceCodeLocation : {
                    columnNumber : 14
                    lineNumber : 0
                    scriptId : <string>
                    url : 
                }
                type : CreationIssue
            }
        }
    }
}
